long_description: This Seattle Sports TerraFun 3-in-1 game pack makes it easy to bring chess, checkers and backgammon virtually anywhere your adventures take you, all in 1 compact and ultralight package. Durable and fast-drying game "board" features a chess/checkers layout on one side and backgammon on the other; multipurpose game pieces are printed with chess ranks on 1 side. Seattle Sports TerraFun 3-in-1 game pack comes in a handy zippered storage pouch.
short_description: This Seattle Sports TerraFun 3-in-1 game pack makes it easy to bring chess, checkers and backgammon virtually anywhere your adventures take you, all in 1 compact and ultralight package.
